EmailTemplate.name: Roof Warranty Amendment Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Roof Warranty Amendment Notice {!Account.Name}, Lease {!Contract.ContractNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Thank you for choosing SunPower for your home energy needs.
This is to inform you that we are updating the roof warranty on your solar lease agreement from 3 years to 10 years of warranty period.
Rest assured that the terms of your agreement will remain intact and unchanged. The attached “Notice of Change” document reflects the updated roof warranty period.
If you have any questions regarding your solar installation, then please feel free to contact your SunPower dealer/installer.
Additionally, you can also contact us directly with any questions or concerns by calling 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) and one of our Solar Advisors will be happy to assist you.
Warm Regards,
SunPower
